actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
short_title: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., Commemorative Coin Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., Commemorative Coin Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue five-dollar gold coins, one-dollar silver coins, and half-dollar clad coins emblematic of the life and works of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

titles.title: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., Commemorative Coin Act
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
